articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Hayabusa2 mission will land the first subsurface asteroid samples on Earth - CNN
articles.description: Japan's Hayabusa2 mission, the first to collect samples from beneath the surface of an asteroid, is scheduled to land back on Earth early Sunday morning in Australia. The mission collected samples from the near-Earth asteroid Ryugu in 2019.
